cause.description:
I have a kidney disease that has put me on dialysis. I had to have both kidneys removed. I would love to visit my family but the cost of traveling while on dialysis is more than I can afford. This cause is also for the awareness of kidney disease.Thank you.
~Pamela
Also if any donations are made they will help people with kidney disease.
PS- If you would like to donate any money to Pamela directly contact her at Pamela_pp@hotmail.com Thanks
1. dialysis patients should be able to travel easier!
cause.mission: help Pamela visit her family in Victoria
cause.name: Help Pamela visit her family:)
